Explanation: Dragons fly and phoenixes dance to welcome the spring; Plum blossoms and bamboo shadows celebrate a prosperous year.
Dragons leap at every door bringing blessings; Phoenixes dance in the sky bringing spring to the hall.
Golden dragons bring good fortune; Auspicious beasts bid farewell to the old and welcome the new.
Dragons soar and tigers leap celebrating the New Year; Flowers bloom signifying wealth and the arrival of spring.
With the majesty of dragons and phoenixes, spring arrives; With immense joy, we celebrate the Lunar New Year.
The spring breeze and rain nurture all things; Dragons and phoenixes dance celebrating the New Year.
Dragons soar and phoenixes dance to celebrate the New Year; The lucky star shines brightly, welcoming the spring light.
Dragons chant and phoenixes sing, auspicious clouds arise; The fragrance of plum and the shadow of bamboo bring fortune to the door.
Auspicious dragons soar, greeting the dawn of spring; Green bamboo and plum blossoms smile.
Dragons dance in the spring breeze, celebrating a bountiful year; Flowers bloom signifying wealth and welcoming the New Year.
